column3: A visitor? We do not get too many of you around here. If there is something you are curious to know, just ask.

You want to know about <Emphasis>me</Emphasis>? I oversee the training of our Azim Bökh wrestlers. It is a traditional style of wrestling in the Steppe, which has been handed down through the generations.
I may not look very intimidating, but do not be deceived. I have attained the rank of “Giant”─a title awarded only to winners of our grand competition.
He he he! One wrong move against me, and you will find yourself pinned flat on your back! Just ask anyone here. They will be able to attest to that.
The Dawn Throne is a holy land, sculpted by the hands of the great Azim himself. It is also the birthplace of his son─the first of our kind.
The Dawn Father's face has been etched into the base of the sacred province─a province we, his children, have been charged with protecting.

From here you can see just how vast the Steppe is, with grasslands that extend onto the distant horizon. It's a breathtaking sight to behold, that has the added advantage of allowing us to observe any advancing beasts or enemy forces.
